WITH user_roles AS (SELECT r.name AS role_name, p.name AS permission_name FROM user u INNER JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN role r ON ur.role_code = r.code LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON r.code = rp.role_code LEFT JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_code = p.code WHERE u.username = #{username}) SELECT DISTINCT UPPER(CONCAT('ROLE_', role_name)) AS name FROM user_roles
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT UPPER(permission_name) AS name FROM user_roles
